subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Joe Maddon, who succeeded Lou Piniella in Tampa, won A.L. manager of the year after guiding the Rays to the World Series. And Piniella, the Cubs’ manager, earned the N.L. honor.
snippet: Joe Maddon, who succeeded Lou Piniella in Tampa, won A.L. manager of the year after guiding the Rays to the World Series. And Piniella, the Cubs’ manager, earned the N.L. honor.
